movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo was about to leave when he suddenly remembered something and turned back to say to his mother, "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."

However, he recognized his mistake in time and repented by jumping from a window."

Principal said, "Moreover, he helped a frightened classmate with CPR. Considering this, the school will record a major demerit for Xia Luo and ask him to self-critique in front of the entire school. Come on, Xia Luo, come to the front."

Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han's back and called out to him, "Zi Chen." Mo Han turned around and walked towards the window. Yu Xuan ran over and grabbed Mo Han's arm.
Mo Han looked at the sleeping Che Zhen Shan, his eyes filled with tears.
Lin Lin asked: "Does it hurt?"
Mo Han was lying on the bed, his lips were pale, and he was breathing heavily. Lin Lin said: "Mo Han, for me, you almost lost your life."
Mo Han said: "This is not"

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said: "I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved."
Lin Lin said, "I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime."
Mo Han said: "Don't mention that. Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'? The living can die, the dead can live. Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin was about to cry, she wiped her tears with her hand, and then she saw Lu Xiao walk in from outside the door. Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, let me do it."
Lu Xiao said, "Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you."
Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days."
Lin Lin said: "I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me."
Lu Xiao said, "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said: "What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?"
Lin Lin said: "I will move him to my room tomorrow and accompany him every day."
Lu Xiao walked in and said: "Lin Lin, don't joke around."
Lin Lin said: "I mean what I say."
Che Zhen Shan said to Lu Xiao: "Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter." "Hurry up."
The two officers exchanged glances, then left. Che Zhen Shan said to Lin Lin, "Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart."
Lu Xiao said: "Lin Lin, let me do it."
Lin Lin said: "No need." Lin Lin turned around to leave, but Lu Xiao followed her.
Che Zhen Shan asked, "Secretary Yang, are you feeling better?"
Mo Han said: "Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Don't think too much, just focus on healing."
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao's room, where Lu Xiao says: "What? The bandit escaped?"
Lu Xiao said: "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says," "They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit." "Could it be the Communist Party?"

Che Zhen Shan said: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Lu Xiao said: "They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked into the room holding a book, placed it on the table, and sat down to read.
Mo Han said: "This music is so nice." "Lin Lin, I think I should go back." "Living here is not very convenient." "You need to work and take care of me."
Lin Lin said: 'Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away.' Lin Lin turned around and left, leaving Mo Han lying on the bed, staring at the ceiling.
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?"
Lin Lin said: "Okay." She then turned around and walked to the bed, gently shaking Lu Xiao.
Lin Lin sat down on the bed, and Mo Han looked at her with a smile.
Mo Han was about to sit on the bed when he suddenly felt a sharp pain in his chest. He quickly grabbed Lin Lin's hand and said, "I'm fine, I'm fine."
Lin Lin said: "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said: 'Ah, no need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now.'
Mo Han held Lin Lin's waist and walked towards the door. Lin Lin was about to open the door when she suddenly stopped.
Lin Lin said: "Coming."
Someone called out to her: "Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang."
Lin Lin ran to the door and said: "I'll take care of it."
Soldier said: "Let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
Lin Lin said: 'Hey, don't put it there.' 'How could you be so clumsy?' 'Get out quickly.'
Mo Han said: "Yes, yes."

Lin Lin quickly picked up the phone and ran out of the office. Mo Han hurriedly followed her, picked up the phone, and saw Lin Lin running out of the office. He quickly picked up the phone and ran after her. Mo Han caught up with Lin Lin at the door, and Lin Lin turned around to look at him.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the military camp, where a Soldier is standing guard. At this moment, a Soldier walks in from outside, salutes, and says: "Report to the battalion commander."
Lu Xiao picked up the phone and asked: "Where did he say he was going?"
Mo Han said: "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Soldier was about to leave when the phone rang. He picked up the phone and said: "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."
Mo Han said: "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."

The scene shifts to the outside of the prison, where a soldier is on guard duty. He sees a woman running out of the prison, pushing a cart. The soldier immediately stands up and walks towards the woman.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is standing in front of a restaurant. He looks around, then turns his head to look at the setting sun. The sunset gradually disappears behind the clouds, and the flowers in the field sway in the wind.
Mo Han said, 'Thank you for taking care of me these days.'
Lin Lin said: 'The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?'
Mo Han said, 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said, "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Mo Han said: 'Then it should be well protected.'
Lin Lin said, 'Could you help me put it on?' Mo Han happily took the necklace from Lin Lin's hand and gently placed it around her neck. Lin Lin adjusted her hair and smiled at Mo Han.
Lin Lin said, "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said, "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said, "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said: 'Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you.'
Lin Lin said, "You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said, "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said, 'Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes.'
Mo Han said, "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin said: "Hmm, who's more important than me?"
Mo Han said, "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked: "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked, "What are you thinking?"
Lin Lin laughed and ran away, Mo Han sat there stunned, watching her leave.
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao walking through the courtyard. He suddenly stopped in front of a window, looked inside, and saw Lin Lin sitting at the desk, writing something.
Mo Han ran out of the alley, Lu Xiao quickly followed him. Mo Han ran to the corner of the street, turned around, and saw Lu Xiao chasing him from behind.
Lu Xiao looked at the woman's retreating figure, his eyes filled with reluctance. He wanted to chase after her but was stopped by the sound of gunfire.
The scene shifts to a dimly lit corridor, where a man in a military uniform is seen lying on the ground. The man in black kneels down and ties the soldier's hands behind his back.
Mo Han's eyes were filled with tears, he looked at the person in front of him, then slowly raised his hand to touch the person's face, but was stopped by Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao said: "Mo Han, Mo Han." Mo Han turned around and saw Lu Xiao lying on the ground. He quickly walked over to help him up.
Mo Han asked: "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao asked: "Secretary Yang, where are you going in such a hurry?"
Mo Han smiled and said, "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said: "Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?"
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, you seem well informed."
Lu Xiao said: "Speak up, who are you meeting?"
Mo Han said: "Do I need to tell you?"
Lu Xiao said: "Don't play dumb with me." "Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists?" "Speak up."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government."
Lu Xiao said: "A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see."
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao asked in confusion, "What, Miss Che?"
Mo Han said: "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said: "Why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!"
Mo Han said: "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said: "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han left, and Lu Xiao watched him leave.
Mo Han walked through the hotel corridor, then knocked on the door of room 305 and said, "Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper."
Yu Xuan said, "Come in."
Mo Han pushed open the door and walked in, Yu Xuan turned her head to look at him, and Mo Han looked back at her.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan."
Mo Han hugged Yu Xuan tightly, unable to believe that she was really here. He said, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"

Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han and said, "Comrade Hong Zichen, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him."

Yu Xuan said: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said: "Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?"
Yu Xuan said, "Unfortunately, that password is a fake."
Mo Han said: "Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber."
Yu Xuan said, "The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, "I found the messages, but realized the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password."
Mo Han said, "Alright."
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han's face and asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said, "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan said, "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said, "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said, 'I forbid you to talk like that.' Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan with a face full of grievance.
Mo Han turned around and said, "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, 'You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse.'
Mo Han, with his head down, didn't dare to look at Yu Xuan. He slowly turned around, and Yu Xuan looked at him with a face full of worry.
Mo Han said, 'I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you.' He then placed the necklace around Yu Xuan's neck.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked: "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said, 'Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me.'
Yu Xuan said, "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han said, "It's getting late, I should go back now." Yu Xuan nodded in agreement. Mo Han continued, "Take care!"
Yu Xuan said, "Wait." Mo Han turned around, and Yu Xuan walked up to him, saying, "Take care."
Mo Han turned around and left, leaving Yu Xuan standing there, stunned.
Mo Han, who was hiding behind the flower pot, saw Che Linlin coming out from the door and quickly hid back.
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin in surprise and said, "Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin asked, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han said, "What are you talking about?"
Che Linlin said: 'Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said, 'Strange, then where have I seen you before?'
Yang Muchen said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said, 'In a dream.'
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin asked in surprise, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?'
Yang Muchen said, 'A bit.' 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'
Che Linlin said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?'
Yang Muchen said, 'You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan.'
Che Linlin asked, 'Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?'
Yang Muchen said, 'Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin asked, 'What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?'

Yang Muchen said, 'Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words...' 'The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable.' 'However, not every Japanese person is bad, and...' 'Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan.' 'They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' 'Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.'
Yang Muchen said, 'So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party.'
Yang Muchen said, 'Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that.' He then picked up his glass and drank it all in one go.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said, 'Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.'

Che Zhenshan said, 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?'
Che Linlin said, 'My affairs are none of your business.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin said, 'If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said, 'Yes.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: "But I was wrong" "Why did you hide that you have a fiancée" "Why didn't you tell me earlier" "You can say directly if you don't like me" "I didn't force you" "You shouldn't lie to me"
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han's sincere expression, and said: "I don't need your gratitude"

Mo Han shouted: "Lin Lin!" Mo Han was about to catch up when he was suddenly pulled back by a hand from behind. He turned around and saw Lin Lin standing in front of him, then turned his head to look at the person behind him. It was Che Zhen Shan.
Lin Lin covered her mouth and sobbed, then said to Mo Han: "Yang Mo Han, we are now even." "You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately." "I never want to see you again."
Mo Han chased after her, shouting: "Lin Lin!"
Lin Lin struggled and said: "Let me go, let me go"
Lin Lin cried out: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said: "Things are not what you think"
Mo Han said: "Follow me, trust me"
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han with a face full of confusion, then turned around and walked away.
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han in front of her, her eyes filled with tears. She couldn't believe that Mo Han would treat her like this.
Lin Lin and Mo Han walked into the room, Lin Lin asked: "Where is the person"

Mo Han said: "Yeah, how is it gone". Lin Lin turned around and walked towards the window, Mo Han followed her to the window, he saw the curtains were drawn, he pulled the curtains open, but there was no one outside.
Lin Lin walked in and said: "You are lying to me"
Mo Han said: "No, he was here just now" "Look, the light is still on" "I really didn't lie to you" "I really met with the fellow villagers" "I want to sell the tobacco soil"
Lin Lin asked: "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"

Mo Han said: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said: "I am telling the truth"
Mo Han said: "I'm telling the truth, what's wrong?"
Lin Lin said: "Nothing, let's go."
Lin Lin turned around and left, leaving Mo Han standing there, stunned.
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line" "He has a woman at home" "Still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin" "What the hell is this."
Lu Xiao asked: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The group leader said: "Still the woman who has seen him."
Lu Xiao said: "No, that Yang kid told me himself."
The group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said: "Group leader, why do you always side with him?"

The group leader said: "Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything."
Lu Xiao said: "Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day."
The group leader said: "Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself."
The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he sits on the sofa, looking at the table full of food and drinks, feeling very helpless.
Mo Han said: "What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking."
Mo Han took a sip of water and said: "I'm not afraid."
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said: 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'

The scene shifts to the living room where Lu Xiao walks in with three soldiers. He says: "See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin." "Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak."
Mo Han said: "What if I tell you no, would you believe me?" The soldiers outside the door heard the noise and rushed in, and Mo Han quickly covered his mouth.
Lu Xiao said: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it?"
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The group leader said: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."
The soldiers dragged Lu Xiao to the ground, and Lin Lin picked up a gun from the table and pointed it at them, saying: "Get out."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao looked at Lin Lin and said: "Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?"
Lin Lin said, 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go.'
Lin Lin fired a shot at Lu Xiao, who fell to the ground. Lin Lin collapsed on the chair, crying uncontrollably.

Mo Han, who was sleeping on the other side of the bed, suddenly woke up, turned over, and looked at Lin Lin. He saw Lin Lin's face full of tears, her eyes tightly shut, and her body trembling slightly. Mo Han sat up straight, his eyes filled with worry.
Mo Han sat up straight, took off his coat, and gently placed it on Lin Lin.
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin with a face full of confusion, then turned to look at the suitcase on the bed.
Mo Han was about to leave when he noticed Lin Lin's sleeping face. He gently sat on the bed, looked at her for a while, then turned around and left.

Mo Han was searching for something in the room, he opened the sofa cushion, there was a photo inside, he looked at it carefully, then he turned around and looked at the bed, he opened the quilt, there was a letter inside.

Mo Han went to the restroom, sat on the toilet, and opened the book. The cover was decorated with a painting of a man and a woman. The title was 'Floral Pavilion'. He flipped through the book, which was filled with drawings.

Mo Han sat on the toilet, flipping through the book, and suddenly stopped. He looked up at the words on the page, 'Is there anyone like Lady Du in this world?' 'If so, can one die for such love?' 'Dreams can be so real.' 'The living can die for dreams, the dead can live.' 'What is the truth?' 'In the world, how many people have dreams?' 'The late Governor of Guangzhou, Lu Xiao, was a man of great virtue.'
Mo Han walked into the room, took off his coat, and placed it on the table. Lin Lin woke up from her sleep, opened her eyes, and asked, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han stood up and said, 'I'm looking for clothes.'
Lin Lin said, "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' He then turned off the light and left.
Lu Xiao said, "Please connect me to 4321." The phone rang, and he said again, "Please connect me to 4321 once more."
Lu Xiao's eyes were filled with tears as he hung up the phone.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: The scene shifts to Hong Zichen's side, where he is on the phone.

The scene shifts to a soldier running into the courtyard of a house. He looked around and saw a notice on the door. The notice read: 'Due to poor business, the house is for rent. Contact after one week at the Great Medicine Store on枫林路.'

The scene shifts to Hong Zichen who has just arrived at the house. He looks around and sees a notice on the door that says the house is for rent due to poor management. He then looks through the window but doesn't see anyone inside.
The soldier, who was originally hiding behind a pillar, saw Man coming out and immediately stood up straight.
Hong Zichen said: "Old Xu, I'm here."
The man said, "Hong Zichen, come on in."
The man said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said, "You've got the wrong person."

The man said, "Hey, friend, don't go, let's have a chat." The man chased after Hong Zichen, shouting, "Friend, friend, friend, don't leave." The man ran into the crowd, shouting, "Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up."
The two were still running, but Hong Zichen was already out of bullets. He had to throw away his gun and run forward.
The two stood face to face, each holding a gun, and the standoff began.
Man said, "Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you."
Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
Man asked, "What do you mean?"
Hong Zichen said, "It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists."
The man smiled and said, "Not bad."

Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us.'
The man looked at Hong Zichen with a smile, then turned his head to look at the sky.
The man said, "Deal."
The man said, "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."
Hong Zichen said, "Birds of a feather, indeed." "So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
The man said, "No problem."
Hong Zichen said, "Then you go on ahead."
The man waved goodbye to Hong Zichen and ran away. Hong Zichen looked at the man's back, then raised his gun and aimed at the man's back. The man turned around and ran away.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han ran over and said: "Che Linlin, how did you get here?"
Che Linlin said: "I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?"
Mo Han said: "I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend."
Che Linlin said: "I'm glad you're fine."
Mo Han said: "Don't run around like this in the future, ok? It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"
Little Eyed Man said: "Friend, see you next time."

Che Linlin looked at the two people in front of her, then turned around and saw Lu Xiao hiding behind a pillar. She quickly ran back to the room. Mo Han said: "You go home first. I still have something to deal with the old friend."
The scene shifts to the attic where Che Linlin is hiding. Mo Han says: "Forget it, let's go home together."
The scene shifts to a restaurant where a man is sitting at the table, smoking a cigarette. He looks up and sees a soldier standing on the second-floor balcony.
Mo Han said: "Speak up, who is he? Speak up, and this is yours."
Little Eyed Man smiled and said: "Really?"
Lu Xiao said: "Of course it's real. Of course. You can choose not to say."
Little Eyed Man hurriedly said: "No, no, no, I'll talk, I'll talk."
Che Zhen Shan was stunned for a moment, then said: "You're saying Yang Mohan is a communist?"
Mo Han said: "That's what the informant told me directly."
Che Zhen Shan looked at Lu Xiao and asked: "How much did you give him?"
Mo Han said: "A gold bar"
Lu Xiao asked: "What's happened?"
Che Zhen Shan looked at the teacup in his hand and said: "Lu Xiao, if Mohan was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?"
Che Zhen Shan looked at him and said: "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."
Mo Han said: "Group leader, I will prove it to you."
The scene shifts to the courtyard where Che Zhen Shan and Little Eyed Man are walking. Suddenly, someone shouts: "Speak."
Little Eyed Man took the cigarette from Lu Xiao's hand and said: "There is a traitor in your organization."
Lu Xiao asked: "Who?"

Che Linlin was lying on the bed, her hand resting on her chest. She slowly lifted her head, her eyes vacant as she looked at Mo Han. Mo Han said: "It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"
Little Eyed Man said: "See you later." Che Linlin was lying on the bed, her hand holding a piece of paper.
The scene shifts to the courtyard where Che Linlin is packing up his luggage. Mo Han walks over, looking around.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is patrolling the streets. He suddenly notices a man in a suit standing in front of a shop. He immediately hides behind a pillar and observes the man's every move.
Little Eyed Man was about to leave when he suddenly heard a noise behind him. He turned around and saw a soldier hiding behind a wall.

Little Eyed Man was walking on the street when suddenly he heard a noise behind him. He turned around and saw a woman in a cheongsam running towards him. He quickly turned back to run away, but the woman caught up and knocked him down.
Che Linlin ran out of the courtyard, and Lu Xiao quickly followed her. He saw Che Linlin running towards the gate, but she suddenly stopped.
Lu Xiao was stunned for a moment, then quickly walked to the door and knocked.

Mo Han said into the phone: "Please connect me to 4321. There's an urgent matter at home pushing me to return. A distant cousin is coming over to help with my business. At 3 PM tomorrow, she'll be at Ruifuxiang Silk Store making a qipao, wearing a chicken-heart-shaped agate pendant around her neck. Bring the account book and make sure to contact her proactively."
The scene shifts to the next day, where Che Linlin and Mo Han are in the shop. Che Linlin asks Mo Han, "Mo Han, do you think I look good in this?"

The man asked: "Really?"

Che Linlin was about to leave when she saw Little Eyed Man coming out of the room. She quickly ran out, and Little Eyed Man followed her out.
The two of them were walking side by side when they suddenly heard the sound of a suona coming from a distance. They both turned their heads to look in the direction of the sound.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3660_3840.text: Che Zhen Shan said: "How can she be a communist? You have to take responsibility for what you said!"

Lu Xiao stood up and said: "Commander, are you really this heartless?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "I've been lenient enough." "Get out."
Lu Xiao said: "Don't go." "Let me ask you." "This afternoon at three." "Did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?"
Lu Xiao looked at Lin Lin and said: "Fine. You don't admit it. Let me ask you, ""why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"
Lin Lin said: "You were following me?"
Lu Xiao said: "I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist."
Lin Lin said: "Yang Mohan, huh, Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated."
Lu Xiao said: "Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?"
Lin Lin said: "Simple, because he was working for the Japanese."
Lu Xiao said: "How can it be? Commander, I never thought it would be like this. If Linlin is not a communist, then Yang Mohan must be."

Che Zhen Shan looked at Lin Lin and asked: "Linlin" "Is Mohan good to you?"
Lin Lin replied: "Pretty good."

movie101_7176565114756137528_3840_4020.text: Station Hill said: "If you're going to go with him now,"

Station Hill said: "Just received an urgent call from the master" "saying there are three important communist underground members" "who will be escorted to Nanjing today" "having lunch in my department" "For safety" "I command you two to go and meet them" "You can't make any mistakes" "Understand?" "If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"
Mo Han said: "Station Hill, I promise to complete the task."

He then went to the pharmacy, took out the prescription, and said to the pharmacist: "I'll come back another day to pick up the two missing packs of medicine."
The scene shifts to Mo Han's office, where Mo Han says: "I saw him enter that pharmacy with my own eyes, his behavior was quite suspicious."
Station Hill asked: "What can that prove"

Station Hill asked: "What do you plan to do?"
Mo Han said: "I hope that Station Hill will put Mo Han under house arrest."
Station Hill said: "Is it necessary"
Mo Han said: "Station Hill, if there is a problem with the transport at noon, is it on him or me, it's not clear."
Station Hill said: "Lu Xiao, you are really like a monkey" "You are really smart."
Mo Han asked: "Station Hill, do you agree?"

Mo Han said: "Thank you, Station Hill. Lu Xiao swears to complete the mission."
Station Hill said: "If there is a communist interception, must capture alive."
Mo Han said: "Yes."
Mo Han turned around and said: "What, I'm not needed anymore, why?"
Lu Xiao walked in and said: "Station Hill, why didn't you use me anymore?"
Station Hill said: "Mo Han, come, sit sit sit, sit, no need at all."

Station Hill put down the teapot, took a sip of tea, and said: "There is no communist escort to Nanjing." "There are only a few guards from the regiment in that vehicle."
Mo Han asked: "Then why did you do this"

Station Hill said: "He first suspected that you were a communist." "Then it was Lin Lin." "Who knows next he might suspect me."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4020_4200.text: Che Zhenshan said: "The trap I set this time" "Lu Xiao will either be killed by the Communists" "or be in big trouble."
Mo Han said: 'But doesn’t the Commies not know the news yet?'
Che Zhenshan said: "I've already let the word out, they will know."
Mo Han sat on the sofa, looking at Che Zhenshan with a smile, and said: "Che Zhenshan, this move is really clever."
Che Zhenshan said: "Mo Han, fortunately you were specially assigned here." "Otherwise, I almost assigned Lin Lin Xu to Lu Xiao."

The scene shifts to the Japanese army's training ground, where a group of soldiers are practicing their combat skills. The commander is sitting in his office, resting on a leather chair, with a letter hidden under his arm.

The scene shifts to the entrance of the military camp, where a car drives in. Inside the house, Mo Han is sitting on the sofa, and Lin Lin enters from outside.
Lin Lin walked in and asked, "What do you need me for?"
Mo Han said, 'The cheongsam is ready. You go pick it up. I have a task and can’t accompany you. It should look very beautiful on you.'
Lin Lin said, "Then I'll go get it now."
Mo Han said, "Wait." "Show it to me when you get back."
Lin Lin smiled at Mo Han, and Mo Han also smiled back. Che Zhenshan sat on the sofa, watching them.

Mo Han said: "The order." He then turned around and walked out of the room. Che Zhenshan sat on the sofa, watching him leave. Mo Han went to the door and looked outside. Lin Lin was standing at the door, smiling at him.
Che Zhenshan closed the door and walked to the table, looking at the items on it. Mo Han said: "Help me pick up some medicine."
Lin Lin happily agreed, and Mo Han was also very happy. He went back to the room and sat on the sofa, drinking tea.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4200_4380.text: Mo Han asked, "Group Leader, do you think Linlin looks good in a red cheongsam?"
Mo Han said, 'Sure.' Che Zhenshan nodded, picked up the teacup, and took a sip.
Mo Han said, 'Actually, I think she looks good in any color. Don't you agree?'
Che Zhenshan said, "I'm a bit tired." After speaking, he got up and left.
Mo Han sat on the sofa, adjusting his collar, then looked up at the ceiling.
The clock on the wall showed it was already 12 o'clock. Mo Han said to Che Zhenshan, "You're awake, Group Leader."
Lu Xiao said, 'Group Leader, we've captured a female communist courier.'
Che Zhenshan asked in confusion, "What?"
Lu Xiao said, 'The prisoner is in the cell.'
Che Zhenshan asked, 'How did she get the message?'
Lu Xiao said, 'Secretary Yang would know best about this.'
Mo Han said, 'Me? Group Leader, you're the one who knows this matter best.'
Lu Xiao asked, 'Group Leader, what's going on?'
Che Zhenshan said, "It's not certain if she's a Communist yet. Mo Han, how about you interrogate her?"
Mo Han said: 'Group Leader, I'm afraid of being accused of seeking glory, better let Lu Xiao do it.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'No, you'll do the interrogation.'
Che Zhenshan stood up and walked out of the room, leaving Mo Han standing there, looking at his back. The scene shifted to the prison cell, where Che Zhenshan and Lu Xiao walked in.
Che Zhenshan turned around and saw Mo Han standing behind him. He was stunned for a moment, then looked at Yu Xuan again.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Miss, this man is from Nanjing, and he's very skilled in interrogation, capable of using brutal torture. If you don't want to suffer physically, speak up now.'
Che Zhenshan looked at the whip in his hand and said, "Hold on, give the whip to Secretary Yang, he will interrogate thoroughly."
The two soldiers took the rope and walked towards Mo Han. Mo Han grabbed the rope and pulled it hard, but the two soldiers didn't budge at all.
The Japanese soldiers opened the door and walked out, leaving Mo Han and Yu Xuan inside. Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan in confusion.

The scene shifts to the Japanese command center, where a raindrop drips from the roof, signaling the start of the operation. The Japanese soldiers are all on high alert, waiting for the signal. Mo Han says, 'I have arranged for Linlin to deliver the encrypted information to you, indicating a change in plan.'
Yu Xuan said, "But I had already set off."
Mo Han said, 'Once Linlin comes back, I’ll kidnap her and we'll break out together.'
Yu Xuan said, "No, the 'Peony Pavilion' code has been encrypted by them; you must stay behind."
Mo Han asked, 'Then what will you do?'

movie101_7176565114756137528_420_600.text: Che Linlin said: "Alright, if he won't go, I will!"
Che Zhen Shan said, "Alright, alright, let's pretend I never came here," he sighed, "Oh, sweet child."
Che Zhen Shan closed the door and left, leaving Che Linlin standing there, feeling helpless.

Che Zhen Shan said: "First, her mother was killed by Japanese soldiers, then, her boyfriend was brutally murdered by a Japanese bayonet. After her boyfriend died, Linlin became emotionally withdrawn. She has rejected every man I introduced to her, including Lieutenant Lu. I know she blames me. She blames me for not avenging her mother all these years. Since the death of her mother, she has never called me father."
Secretary Yang stood up and said, "Commander, I should offer her an apology personally,"
Che Zhen Shan said: "No, no, no, Secretary Yang. Don't worry. She will apologize to you voluntarily in due time,"
Secretary Yang said: "No, no, no, I think I..."
Che Zhen Shan picked up the phone and said, "Hold on," ZhenShan Che interjected, "Yes, Commander?" "Yes, it's Secretary Yang."

Secretary Yang was about to knock on the door when he heard Che Zhen Shan's voice from inside. He quickly walked towards the sound and said, "Secretary Yang, what are you doing here?"
Secretary Yang said: "I came here to apologize to Miss Che,"
Che Zhen Shan said: "This matter is not urgent, did you know, the special envoy Bai has already arrived at the division headquarters and will make it here by noon tomorrow."
Che Zhen Shan smiled and said: "Secretary Yang, I hope you will speak good things about us by then,"
Secretary Yang said: "The Commander has always done a great job, hasn't he?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Thank you, thank you! I will never treat you unfairly, Secretary Yang. If you have any requests, please feel free to let me know," said ZhenShan Che.

Che Zhen Shan said: "That's very simple. Just tell me how much you need, and I will have Lieutenant Lu arrange it for you,"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4380_4560.text: Yu Xuan said: "I'm ready to sacrifice at any time."
The scene shifts to the Japanese command center, where Che Zhenshan asks, "Why there is no sound?"

Mo Han said: "I'll check if you have any documents on you" "Tell me, who are your superiors and subordinates?"
Mo Han said: "Don't pretend to be confused with me"

Che Zhenshan took off his headphones and said: "Okay, tell Mo Han to stop interrogation for now, and don’t let him get involved in this matter again"
Che Linlin was tied to the door frame, her neck wrapped in a rope, and her mouth gagged with a towel. She looked at Che Linlin with a face full of hatred.
Che Linlin rushed to the door, opened it, and saw Yu Xuan hanging on the beam. She quickly untied the rope around Yu Xuan's neck.

movie101_7176565114756137528_4560_4740.text: Ling Ling took out a jade pendant from her chest and handed it to Yu Xuan.
Lu Xiao's eyes were filled with tears, but he still forced a smile. He looked at the two people sitting on the pavilion, and his heart was filled with mixed feelings.
Ling Ling, with tears in her eyes, slowly raised her hand to her chest, revealing a bulletproof vest underneath.
Mo Han asked, "What do you think living is for?" "For the country, for the faith? Or for money and status?"
Ling Ling said, "I live only for the people I love," and then she took out a dagger from her waist.

The scene shifts to the courtyard where Mo Han and Ling Ling are walking. Mo Han says, "Look how beautiful this tree is," "It's a pity it's twisted by living in such an environment. What do you say to moving it one day?"
Ling Ling said: "But, won't it die if we do that?"
Mo Han says, "No, it will grow even better," Mo Han reassures, "Ling Ling, I'm tired of the deceit in officialdom. Would you leave it all behind and come away with me?"
Ling Ling asked in confusion, "Just the two of us?"

Ling Ling looked at Lu Xiao, then turned her head to look at the sky. She took out a jade pendant from her chest and gently stroked it.
Ling Ling asked, "Mo Han, have you ever given this kind of pendant to another woman?"
Ling Ling looked at him in confusion, and Mo Han said, "No, why do you suddenly ask?"

Ling Ling said: "I have always felt that we are not on the same path." "Like a swan and a shrimp pulling a carriage together," "The swan yearns for the sky, while the shrimp never dares leave the water." "No matter how hard we try, we can never head in the same direction."
Ling Ling looked at Mo Han with tears in her eyes, and Mo Han said, "There's always a way."
Mo Han held her tightly and said, "Ling Ling, don't cry. What's wrong?"
Ling Ling said, "Mo Han, let me think. My mind is really confused right now."
Mo Han said, "Don't overthink; sometimes life is very simple."

movie101_7176565114756137528_4740_4920.text: Yang Mo Han said: "Sometimes it’s complicated."
Che Linlin said: "Maybe."

Che Linlin, with tears in her eyes, turned around and walked away.
Che Linlin held the beads in her hands, then covered her face with her hands.
Yang Mo Han walked in and said to Che Zhenshan: "Commander, I might not have been tough enough during the interrogation this afternoon."

Che Zhenshan said: "Don't talk about that. A secret order just came from the division commander. We are to launch a large-scale attack on the Communists soon. Mohan, I intend to send you and Linlin to America."
Yang Mo Han said: "The United States."
Che Zhenshan said: "Yes, I’m worried Linlin might have unclear dealings with the Communists."
Yang Mo Han asked: "Do you mean Linlin and that female Communist?"
Che Zhenshan said: "Promise me, leave immediately" "Go to Shanghai tomorrow" "But before you leave, you need to do something important" "Kill this person"
Yang Mo Han said: "Japanese."
Che Zhenshan said: "Yes, Shan Ben Ichiro. Linlin's mother was killed by him. He just arrived in Liu City. He will be at the Baixiao Gate tonight for entertainment."
Yang Mo Han said: "Commander."
Che Zhenshan asked: "Is there a problem?"

Yang Mo Han said: "No, I just want to know. How do you plan to deal with that female Communist?" "I mean Linlin, if she is really with that woman." "I almost beat her to death this afternoon." "If anything happens to her, I'm afraid Linlin will resent me, so."
Che Zhenshan said: "As long as you bring back Shan Ben Ichiro's head, I’ll release her immediately."
Che Zhenshan quickly stepped forward to stop her, saying: "Linlin, don't get excited." "Didn't I send Mohan?"
Che Linlin said: "You sent him alone, isn’t that sending him to his death? Why aren’t you going?"
Che Zhenshan said: "Linlin, listen to your father."
Che Linlin said, 'I don’t have a father like you. Let me go, I need to find Mohan.'
Che Zhenshan said: "Do you think you can find him?" "Do you think he will really avenge you?"
Che Linlin said, "He will definitely come back, he told me to wait for him. He doesn't lie."
Che Zhenshan said: "Going alone, he’s walking into the lion's den. Do you think he can come back alive?"
Che Linlin asked: "Then why did you let him go?"

movie101_7176565114756137528_4920_5100.text: Che Zhen Shan said: "Yang Mo Han might be a Communist member."
Che Linlin said: "So, you intend to eliminate him through the Japanese."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Yes, for you."
Che Linlin said: "It's for your own good, isn't it?"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Linlin, no matter what you think, daddy will always love you!" After saying that, he turned around and left.
Che Zhen Shan picked up the phone and said: "Hello" "What" "Lu Xiao and the female Communist fled together" "Are they accomplices?" "Order the third company to assemble at once."
Che Zhen Shan turned around and left, leaving Che Linlin standing there in a daze.
Che Linlin turned around and saw Yang Mo Han, who was disguised as a woman, and said: "Che Linlin, it's me."
Che Linlin looked at Yang Mo Han in disbelief, then saw him pick up the bundle from the ground and throw it on the floor. Yang Mo Han said, 'You can now console your aunt’s spirit in heaven.'
Che Linlin said: "Mo Han, thank you. I can't repay you for your kindness in my lifetime."
Yang Mo Han said: "{Why are you} so polite with me?"
Che Linlin said: "I will follow you even if I have to cross fiery waters."
Yang Mo Han said: "All right, then let's go now." "Shanyamoto will never let us go after killing the Japanese." "But before we leave, I need to bring someone along."
Che Linlin said: "Bring the female accomplice." "She has been taken away by Lu Xiao."
Yang Mo Han said: "He was taken away by Lu Xiao."
Che Linlin said: "My father suspects that they are Communists and has sent someone to follow them."
Yang Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao being a Communist is a joke."
Che Linlin asked: "What did you say?"
Yang Mo Han said: "I just feel Lu Xiao doesn't seem like a Communist."
Che Linlin said: "You seem to know a lot about the Communist Party."
Yang Mo Han said: "I wouldn't say that I know them well, but this time, killing Shanyamoto, I have to thank the Communist Party. They have helped me both inside and out."
Che Linlin asked: "Why would they help you?"
Yang Mo Han said: "They want the encryption key in return. I know the key is with you, so I agreed to their terms."
Che Linlin said: 'The key is not with me. It seems to be in the commander's office safe. Apart from my father, no one has seen it.'
Yang Mo Han said: 'But it's okay. If necessary, we can kill the donkey after it's done working. They wouldn't dare do anything.'
Che Linlin said: 'But...'

Yang Mo Han said: "All right, you should rest early." "I'm going to meet the commander." After speaking, Yang Mo Han turned and left. Che Linlin watched him leave, then turned to look at the clothes on the table. She walked over to the wardrobe, opened the door, and took out a coin.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5100_5280.text: Mo Han was stunned for a moment, then quickly stood up and walked towards Lin Lin. Lin Lin raised her gun and pointed it at Mo Han. Mo Han asked, "Lin Lin, what are you doing here?"
Lin Lin asked: "What are you doing?"
Mo Han said: "At this point, I don't want to hide it from you any longer."

Mo Han looked at Lin Lin's determined face, his eyes filled with reluctance. He slowly walked towards Lin Lin, then turned to look at the desk. Mo Han said, 'My life is in your hands, go ahead and shoot.'

Lin Lin said: "Mo Han, you've been using me all along, haven't you? Using me as a shield, gaining my father's trust, getting a foothold here to gather information. Am I right? Aren't you afraid of exposing yourself, aren't you afraid of dying?"

Mo Han said: "Ever since I embarked on this path, I've regarded myself as already dead. To console the countless unjust souls like your mother's, for the happiness of hundreds of millions of suffering compatriots, for a new world, my death means nothing."

Mo Han said: 'Lin Lin, the Japanese devils are now burning, killing, and looting everywhere, destroying our homes. Our countrymen are in deep suffering. We are all Chinese, and as a conscientious Chinese, facing national disaster, the Kuomintang not only fails to resist but also targets the communists. How can one not be angry, how can one not be heartbroken?'

Mo Han looked at Lin Lin and said, 'Lin Lin, for the harm I've caused you, I solemnly apologize. This apology has been weighing on my heart so heavily that I could hardly breathe. That's why I planned to take you away and make it up to you with my actions.'
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han and said: "Thank you for your kindness and honesty."
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han and said: "Try my birthday."
Mo Han walked to the safe, opened the door, and said, 'It won't open.'
Lin Lin said: 'Try my mother's birthday, 1208.' Mo Han tried to open the safe with the password.
Lin Lin said: 'Try my mother's death anniversary, 1011.' Mo Han turned around and opened the door.
Mo Han turned the key in the lock, opened the safe, and took out a stack of cash.

movie101_7176565114756137528_5280_5460.text: Mo Han walked over and said: "Don't be sad. Let's go." "Didn't you say you would be willing to go with me?"
Lin Lin said: "If I leave, what about my father?" "You go by yourself."
Che Zhen Shan opened the door and walked in, pointing a gun at Mo Han and said: "You're too naive to fight with me."
Che Zhen Shan pointed the gun at Lin Lin and said: "Come with me."
Lin Lin said: "Let him go."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lin Lin, put the gun down." "Do you want my life?"
Lin Lin said: "My life was given by you." "It was also given by him." "I don't want him to die by your hand."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Do you know how dangerous his identity is to us?" "Lin Lin, he is a Communist."
Lin Lin said: "I don't care which party he belongs to. As long as it's a party against the Japanese invaders, it's a good party. If you really love me, let him go immediately. I'll count to three."
Lin Lin said: "One."
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin"
Che Zhen Shan said: "Two."
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, why are you forcing me like this?"
Mo Han snatched the gun from Lin Lin's hand and said: "Give me the gun."
Che Zhen Shan pointed the gun at Mo Han and said: "You and your whole family better behave."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao said: "Che Zhen Shan, hmph, the commander will be here soon." "He will tell you whether my career as an adjutant ends here," "or your career as a regiment commander ends."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Lu Xiao, you beast, do you believe I won't shoot you?"
Lu Xiao said: "Ah, don't be so agitated, my dear commander." "Put the gun down."
Lu Xiao said: "Or I'll blow your whole family up." Lu Xiao pulled out a grenade and threw it at Che Zhen Shan.
Lu Xiao said: "Commander, this is what is called the student surpassing the master."
Lu Xiao said: "What a pity, Secretary Yang. You ended up mixed with a female Communist."
Lin Lin said: "Lu Xiao, thank you for giving me" "the honorable title of Communist."
Lu Xiao said: "Then you should thank that female Communist." "It was she who informed us about you as the hidden operative." "You thought you could run, but you couldn't escape my bullet, Lu Xiao."
Mo Han pulled out a gun from his waist and shouted: "Get down!"
The two soldiers were knocked down by Mo Han. Mo Han said to Lin Lin: "Quick, get up!" "Let's go."
Che Zhen Shan grabbed Lin Lin and asked: "Wait, wait, where are we going?"
Lin Lin said: "We'll talk outside. The commander will be here soon. We have to leave now, father."
Che Zhen Shan said: "You finally called me father." "After all these years, you finally called me father."

Lin Chunhu said: "First of all, running this turtle farm is profitable, very profitable, and I think all villagers can participate. Even those at home with children or the elderly lacking the ability to work can join in. I will provide the technology for free and help everyone expand sales channels. Then, I will distribute salaries to everyone."

The villagers clapped their hands in approval. Lin Chunhu continued: "Second, near our village at the foot of Phoenix Mountain, I plan to develop a seedling market, so villagers won't have to get up early and walk dozens of miles to sell seedlings anymore."
Lin Chunhu said: "During my three years in office, I want to build the largest seedling market in our city." "How about that?"
The crowd applauded and said: "Good" "Finally someone who does tangible work" "Yes, exactly"

Lin Chunhu continued: "Third, I think there is something very important, which is the ecological construction of our village. I promise that within my three-year term, I will tackle the pollution sources upstream of the river and make our mother river clean and bright."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3120_3300.text: Lu Chunhu said: 'My speech is over, please vote for me.' The audience clapped enthusiastically.

"The one with the most votes is Lu Chunhu with 36 votes, Zhang Dong with 28 votes, Zhang Tiegui with 25 votes, Wang Qiuhong with 23 votes, and Liu Mengting with 23 votes." "Okay, next we will have our five newly elected committee members come on stage." "Let's welcome them."
The villagers clapped their hands and cheered, and Lu Chunhu stood up to shake hands with the villagers.
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother walked in and said: "Wait a minute, wait a minute, the election is invalid, the election is invalid! Someone is buying votes, someone is buying votes."
The photo shows Lu Chunhu and his mother.
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said: "Everyone look, this is our village's Lu Chunhu. He gave the old party member He Dame a soft-shelled turtle to get more votes in this election."
Another villager said, "Just one photo doesn't prove anything."
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said: "Of course it does." "I saw him give He Dame the turtle with my own eyes." "He even said," "make sure you vote for me this year."
Lu Chunhu said: "Are you stalking him?"
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said, "I wasn't stalking him. I just saw it by chance."
Lu Chunhu said, "That's quite a coincidence, isn't it?"
Zhang Dong's Younger Brother said: "It was just a coincidence that I saw him give He Dame the turtle. If I hadn't seen it, who knows how many others he might have given turtles to."
Zhang Xi said: 'Alright, whether it's a coincidence or not, the facts are right here. Mayor Yang, if a candidate is really bribing voters...'

movie101_7235213933035192887_3300_3480.text: Zhang Xi asked: "How should we deal with this?"
Town Mayor said: "If this really happened, we will investigate thoroughly."
Zhang Xi said: "Okay." "So is Lin Chunhu's election today invalid?"
Town Mayor said: "Decisions can only be made after investigation," "This matter has not been fully investigated yet, has it?"
The scene shifts to the village committee, where someone is shouting: "Come on, everyone come have a look," "Someone rigged the election," "Come see."

Zhang Xi said: "The president of the tortoise farming cooperative in Camellia Village, Lin Chunhu, during the election period, delivered two tortoises to our village's old party member Aunt He, in order to gain an extra vote in the election."
Genxing's Dad said: "How can offering a tortoise be bribery?"

Zhang Xi said: "During the election period, whatever is offered is considered bribery, "as per the legal regulation" the team leader of the village organization term ends in six months"to the end of the community election"under the pretext of helping and condoling"indirectly giving things to voters" is also considered bribery."
Genxing's Dad said: "I tell you Zhang Xi" "How could you be so heartless" "Lin Chunhu is doing good deeds" "And you label it as bribery" "There's no such thing!"
Other villagers said: "Yeah, yeah, way too much."
Zhang Xi said: "Genxing's Dad why are you so upset" "Could it be" "that you also benefitted from Lin Chunhu?"
Genxing's Dad said: "This is outrageous!"
The crowd said: "How can you speak like that?" "Enough, let's go."
Town Mayor said: "Tea break."
Lin Chunhu said: "Thank you, mayor."
Town Mayor said: "Lin Chunhu, I want to ask you, did you or did you not give Aunt He the tortoises?"
Lin Chunhu said: "Yes."
Town Mayor asked: "Do you know Aunt He is a party member?"
Lin Chunhu said: "I know she is a party member!"
Town Mayor asked: "When did this happen?"
Lin Chunhu said: "The 6th, the day before the village's party organization's community election notice was issued."
Town Mayor asked: "Then when you gave her the tortoise, did you hint about the election?"
Lin Chunhu said: "No."
Town Mayor asked: "Then why did you give him the tortoise?"

Lin Chunhu said: "I had no motive, I just heard Aunt He was not in good health recently, and she was all by herself, so I felt sorry for her. I sent a home-raised tortoise, just to give her some strength."

Lin Chunhu said: "I was born in Camellia Village and grew in Camellia Village. I always want to do more for the villagers of Camellia Village. I won't say anything else. I, Lin Chunhu, have a clear conscience."
At this moment, someone knocked on the door and said: "Mayor Yang, please come out, two old men insisted to see you." Town Mayor stood up and walked out of the office.

Genxing's Dad said: "Hello Mayor Yang, Mayor Yang, you cannot just listen to the Zhang brothers. Lin Chunhu is unjustly defamed. Thirty of our village elders co-signed to vouch for him. Here is the joint guarantee letter, Mayor Yang, take a look."
Genxing's Dad said: "Their names are all here." "Actually, every New Year and holiday," "all the elders over seventy in our village" "receive a consolation gift from Lin Chunhu."
The old man said: "Whenever the poor and lonely elderly in our village fall sick, he is always the first to front up their medical expenses."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3480_3660.text: The Old Man said: "Yes, Mayor Yang, this is not a bribery election at all. You must investigate him thoroughly and return Lin Chunhu's innocence, okay?"

Mayor Yang said: "The Old Man, don't worry. We will definitely investigate this matter. If Lin Chunhu really didn't bribe, we will not wrong him. You two go first. We are still investigating this matter. When you go back, just wait patiently for our news."
The Old Man said: "Okay, Mayor Yang, we'll take our leave first."
Mayor Yang said: "Okay, goodbye." The old couple left, and Mayor Yang watched them leave.
Bao Liang said: "Come on, come on, Chichi."
Another person said: "Let's toast to Secretary Zhang."
Zhang Dong said: "Low-key, low-key, low-key." "The town committee members haven't been finally decided yet." "Low-key, everyone take one, come."
Zhang Dong said: "Brother, why are you so careful?" "Everyone present today is our own brother." "If you don’t take this village secretary position, who will take it?" "Everyone agrees, right?"

Zhang Dong said: "You see, the elected committee members, the old secretary is old, Liu Mengting is just a freshman out of school, she has no experience. Lin Chunhu’s eligibility has been cancelled. Now, in terms of strength and qualifications, this secretary position can't be given to others."
Everyone chimed in: "Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, well said."

Zhang Dong said: "Okay." "To be honest, I didn't want to be it initially." "Being a village official is not a great job." "Being a village chief is annoying enough for me." "However, since everyone trusts me so much and the village can't find a suitable candidate for the time being, I'll reluctantly go along with the public opinion."
The crowd clapped and cheered, and the four drank happily.
Zhang Dong said: "Speaking of this election, it not only has people's will, but also the will of heaven."
Zhang Dong said: "Yes, who allowed our Xiaobao to take such a nice photo, it's simply a divine favor."
Everyone said: "Yes, yes, yes, Xiaobao is the number one hero." "Bao Liang brother, I toast to you."
Zhang Dong said: "Ah, by the way, why didn't we call Xiaobao for a couple of drinks?"
Bao Liang said: "Xiaobao must not be called" "He is kept in the dark about this matter."
The scene shifts to a bamboo forest, where Zhang Dong is shouting: "Mengting!"

movie101_7235213933035192887_3660_3840.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "What did I do to offend you this time? I've already advised my dad about the pig farm issue." "He promised he would change."
Liu Mengting said: 'See for yourself.'
Zhang Xiaobao looked at the photos and said: "What are these?" "Aren't these the photos I took last time we went to Aunt He’s house together?" "What's going on?"

Liu Mengting said: "Shouldn't I be asking you that?" "Only you, me, and Brother Chunhu were there that day." "How did this photo get out?" "Do you know Brother Chunhu was falsely accused of bribery because of this photo?"
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Ah, this this..." Liu Mengting said: "Tell me." "Wasn't this done by your dad colluding with your family members?"
Zhang Xiaobao said: "I really don't know anything about this."
Liu Mengting said: "This is your camera." "If you don’t know, then who does?"
Zhang Xiaobao turned his head to look at Liu Mengting, then turned back and said, "You think I was involved in this, don't you?"
Liu Mengting said: "Xiaobao, I used to think you were different from those people. But now, I am really disappointed in you, you know that?"

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Even though the camera is mine, many people have had access to it." "And many people have borrowed it." "Forget it, I won't explain anymore." "Mengting, we've known each other for so many years." "I thought you would at least have some basic trust in me." "Now I see, I overestimated myself."
Zhang Xiaobao turned around and left, leaving Liu Mengting kneeling on the ground, crying bitterly.
Zhang Baoliang looked at the fish in the tank and said, "I'll catch you."
Zhang Xiaobao was about to go upstairs when he saw Zhang Baoliang looking at the fish tank downstairs. He quickly went downstairs and asked, "Dad, have you seen my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Have you seen it? I’m in a hurry."
Zhang Baoliang said, "No, just don’t go out."
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at Zhang Baoliang and said, "Did you hide my camera?"
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Yes, I took it.'
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Give it back to me."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

Zhang Baoliang said, "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"
Zhang Xiaobao walked over to Zhang Baoliang and said: "Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"
Zhang Baoliang said, "I'm doing this for survival."

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang said: "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. Ah, if you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."
Bao Liang said: "Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money."
Xiao Bao said: "Stop it, I don't want so much money." "What I want is a clear conscience." "To be human, one must have a conscience." "Without it, we're worse than pigs."
Bao Liang cursed: "Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!"
Bao Liang said: 'Take the camera.' He then picked up the camera from the table and handed it to Xiao Bao.
Bao Liang said: "Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!"
Xiao Bao, who was about to leave, turned back and saw Bao Liang chasing after him. He quickly ran away.
Mayor Yang ran into the village committee office and asked the staff: "Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?"
Mayor Yang said: "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."
Mayor Yang asked: "Then does he have anything to do with this election?"
At this moment, Xiao Bao ran in shouting: "Town leader!"
Mayor Yang asked: "Hey, what's the matter, young man?"
Xiao Bao said: "Town leader!" "I'm actually here to clarify something." "Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election." "The photo, it was actually..." "I took it, you see."

Mayor Yang said: "Everyone, please be quiet." "I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all." "Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election." "Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out."

Mayor Yang said: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."
Mayor Yang said: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: The crowd clapped and cheered: "Good" "Really good."

Mayor Yang said: "Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter, to announce to everyone, after verification through public reporting, one of the candidates, Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery. The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive. So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member. In this term's election, he will not participate. Even if elected, it would be invalid."
The crowd said: "Exactly, exactly, exactly."
Younger Brother asked, "Big brother, where are we going?"

Zhang Dong said: "Big brother."
Zhang Dong said: "Scram."

Meng Ting said: "Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage."
The villagers asked: "Xiao Liu, what is ecological treatment?" "We don't understand, can you explain it to us?"

Meng Ting said: "Okay." "This ecological treatment" "refers to" "after collecting and settling the sewage" "to build constructed wetlands" "through the joint action of wetland plants" "organic substrates, and microorganisms" "and through multi-layer filtration" "degrade pollutants" "purify water quality and discharge rationally" "this method of sewage treatment" "is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly" "plus the investment cost for individual projects is low" "it's a purely ecological treatment approach"
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?"
Woman in Blue Clothes said: "Exactly, building a sewage pool at our doorstep, that would smell terrible."
The crowd responded: "Yeah."
Meng Ting said: "Everyone, take a look. This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village. This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand."

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu asked: "What is going on here"
Eldest Brother said: "Chun Hu, take a look"

Chun Hu said: "Support Agreement: For the convenience of managing our household and establishing a business, my brother and I have voluntarily decided to divide our household. Eldest brother, Lin Genwang, will support our father, and second brother, Lin Genxing, will support our mother. Both will look after their respective parents, provide for their every need till the end, bear clear responsibilities, and not interfere in each other's affairs. To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament."
Second Brother said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Old Father said: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds, but we have to do it behind their backs, it feels like being thieves."
Old Father said: "This, both of us living separately, my legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother said: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: "Living together is no big deal."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: "What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?"

Chun Hu said: "Stop arguing" "Aren't you ashamed?" "This is about supporting your parents" "Not contracting a turtle pond" "Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed" "To let you join our turtle farming cooperative" "But now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
The two brothers looked at each other, and Old Father asked: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu said: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: The man said: "Think about the old man's wishes" "Take good care of the old man's health" "That's settled then" "The two old men will live together" "As for the support payments" "The two brothers will split them equally."
The scene shifts to the next day, with the sound of a cow and calf.
The scene shifts to the village committee, where Old Secretary and Mayor Yang shake hands and greet each other.
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."

Old Secretary said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
The man asked: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
The man in gray clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Old Secretary said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go"
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Seated Woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman said: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Seated Woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"
The scene shifts to the next day, where the sun rises and the forest is filled with birdsong. A woman in black clothes is riding a bicycle on the road, shouting: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Alright, got it"
Seated Woman asked: "Is it heavy?"
The man replied: "Not heavy"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
The man said: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The car drove along the winding mountain road, surrounded by lush greenery.

The scene shifts to a village where a car stops. The villagers gather around, saying, "Here he comes," "Big brother, watch your step," "Be careful," "Slow down," "Big brother, slow down," "You're finally back big brother," "Let's go," "Big brother, you seem very energetic," "Let's go, let's go," "Watch your step."
The scene shifts to a few women playing cards in the village. A man in a suit walks past them, and one of the women asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said, "Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?"
The woman said, "She's only been married a few months." "The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi." "Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

Another woman said, "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."

The scene shifts to a mahjong table, where a woman says: "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief" "He doesn’t manage the village affairs" "Spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business."
The scene shifts to a few women playing mahjong. One woman says, "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him."
The woman said, "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman said, "The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village."
The woman sitting opposite said, "East, West, South, North, Central, isn't this a full mahjong hand?"
The woman said: "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The woman asked, "Why?"

The woman said, "Oh, that makes sense."
The scene shifts to a mountain village where a group of people is walking up the stairs.
The scene shifts to a restaurant where a group of people walk in. One of them says, "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
Zhang Dong asked, 'Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?'
Zhang Dong said, 'Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down.'
The man said, "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The other person said, "Big brother."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said, 'Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?'
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Good, sit here, sit, sit well." Liu Mengting sat on a rock in the stream, and Zhang Xiaobao continued, "One, two, three, hmm, looks good."
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said, "Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said, "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Who says?" "The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue," "as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
The two walked side by side along the stream, with Liu Mengting leading the way. Zhang Xiaobao followed closely behind, carrying a large bag.
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?"

Liu Mengting said: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao asked, "And then?"

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."
Liu Mengting said, "Hey, why are you walking so slow?" "Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster." The two walked quickly back to the village.
The scene shifts to the kitchen, where Liu Mengting is boiling water. She takes the lid off the pot, pours the hot water into a bowl, and then pours it into a teapot.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting brought the medicine to Auntie He's bedside and said, 'Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget.'

Zhang Xiaobao was secretly taking pictures of the two, then put down his camera and said, "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Chun Hu said: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."

Liu Mengting said: "Hey."

Auntie He said, "Much better!"
Chun Hu said, "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He said, 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

The scene shifts to the village committee, where villagers are gathered around the announcement board. The announcement reads: "Announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization." "According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization," "our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang was amused by the pig head, laughing heartily.
Bao Liang said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Director said, "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang said: 'Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.'
Director said: "Old Five."
Director said: "Oh."
Director said, "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch."
Zhang Xiaobao said: 'Okay.'
Director said: 'Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang.'
Director said: "Alright alright alright."
Director said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Bao Liang said: 'Hey.'
Director asked, "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang said, "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang said: 'Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm.'
Director said, 'That's a good thing!'

Bao Liang said: "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Bao Liang was stunned for a moment, then burst into laughter.
Bao Liang said: 'Oh.'
Director said, "This timing isn't right."
Bao Liang said: 'Ah?'
Director said, "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you"
Director said, "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Director said, 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
